title: Nightmares and Dreamscapes, Pt. 2
itunes:title: Nightmares and Dreamscapes, Pt. 2
itunes:subtitle: There are 24 short stories within Stephen King's Nightmares and Dreamscapes -- and they're a polarizing bunch as you've already heard. In the second of two episodes dedicated to the 1993 collection, the Losers discuss the very best of ...
description:
There are 24 short stories within Stephen King's Nightmares and Dreamscapes -- and they're a polarizing bunch as you've already heard. In the second of two episodes dedicated to the 1993 collection, the Losers discuss the very best of 'em all. Join co-hosts McKenzie Gerber, Dan Caffrey, Ahse Digg, and Mel Kassel as they return to the camp fire and share their 12 favorite tales in King's mighty tome. What's their top pick? Will it be "Rainy Season"? Maybe "Home Delivery"? You'll have to listen and find out!


Follow on Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Patreon


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
